nodes.text: Odupiendo racing was a popular sport during the last decades of the Old Republic. In this fast-moving sport, flightless Odupiendos raced against each other in circular tracks. The planet Naboo was famous for its Odupiendo racing tracks. The race was a favorite betting sport in establishments such as the Outlander Club on Coruscant.
On one of the viewscreens in the Outlander Club, an Odupiendo race could be witnessed. It apparently involved bipedal racing-animals running along a circular track, similar to real-life horse-racing.
